attributes.action: Withdraw free healthcare for injuries incurred as a result of criminal activity.
attributes.additional_details: We call on the Government to charge for healthcare and emergency treatment for people who have incurred the injury or condition as a result of criminal, anti-social or irresponsible activity, eg brawling in a public place, drunk and disorderly, resisting arrest, use of illegal substances, alcohol abuse, injuries recieved as a result of burgulary or theft, trespassing or vandalism.
